div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 527 Amara environs, c. 90 km. E of Bucha- (382) rest, Rumania, 1933 Burial: c. 125-100 B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 8 AR Alexander III: 4 dr. Thasos: 4 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: E. Caraianopol, Bucharest CNA 10 (1934), p. 52 â€ Golescu, BulMuzMilitNat. 5 (1941-2), nos. 9-10, 53 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 50 (says 4 tetradr. of Alexander) Erroneously listed in Noe under the name of the collector
